concept.title: Exporting and saving contacts on your mobile device
concept.shortdesc: As an administrator, you can control how your contact list is managed. Edit the following policy to fit your business needs.

title.cmdname: Policy id = im.mobile.allowContactExport, Default Setting: ON

section.p: By default, Sametime for Android users can export their contacts to their local contact database. Turn this setting off to disable the export feature.

p.note: This policy does not apply to Sametime for iOS. Due to security and compliance reasons, Sametime for iOS users can only save a contact's phone number or email address, and not the entire contact.
